gridded-point-info-window
directive in module npn-viz-tool

Description

The base info window contents for gridded point data. This directive doesn't open the InfoWindow but is just used to render its contents (not intended for general re-use).

Usage

as element:
<gridded-point-info-window
       point="{number}"
       layer="{object}"
       legend="{object}"
       lat-lng="{google.maps.LatLng}">
</gridded-point-info-window>

Directive info

  • This directive creates new scope.

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
pointnumber

The point data returned by the layer.

layerobject

The currently selected map layer.

legendobject

The legend for the currently selected layer.

latLnggoogle.maps.LatLng

The LatLng where the InfoWindow has been be opened.
